TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItemCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects stored in a .

span.span: Represents a collection of objects stored in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存储表示子项的父对象中控件。A stores objects that represent subitems of a parent in the control. 仅在显示子项控制列中的指定当属性控件以及何时属性控件设置为。Subitems are only displayed in a control when columns are specified in the property of the control and when the property of the control is set to . 中的子项的顺序确定子项显示中的列控件。The order of subitems in the determines the columns the subitems are displayed in the control. 有多种方式可向集合中添加子项。There are a number of ways to add subitems to the collection. 方法添加一个到集合。The method adds a single to the collection. 若要添加到集合的子项数，你创建的数组对象，并将其传递到方法。To add a number of subitems to the collection, you create an array of objects and pass it to the method. 如果你想要在集合中的特定位置插入一个子项，则可以使用方法。If you want to insert a subitem at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除子项，你可以使用方法或方法如果你知道该子项在集合中的位置。To remove subitems, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the subitem is located in the collection. 方法使你能够从而不是使用集合中移除所有子项方法一次都移除单个子项。The method enables you to remove all subitems from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single subitem at a time. 除了用于添加和删除子项，方法和属性还提供了方法的集合中找到子项。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing subitems, the also provides methods to find subitems in the collection. 方法使您能够确定是否是集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection. 一旦你知道该子项位于集合中，可以使用方法来确定该子项集合中的位置。Once you know that the subitem is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the subitem is located in the collection.

span.span: Adds a subitem to the collection with specified text.

returns.span: The that was added to the collection.

span.span: The that was added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法允许您通过指定子项的文本添加到集合的一个子项。This version of the method allows you to add a subitem to the collection by specifying the text of the subitem. 当调用此方法时，新创建具有指定的文本。When this method is called, a new is created with the specified text. 然后，可以使用返回此方法以设置属性并调用方法来操作该子项。You can then use the that is returned by this method to set properties and call methods to manipulate the subitem. 如果你已经有一个现成你想要添加到集合，你可以使用的版本方法接受作为参数或使用方法如果你想要在特定添加子项集合中的位置。If you already have an existing that you want to add to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts a as a parameter, or use the method if you want to add the subitem at a specific position within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个还在代码示例中提供的映像中创建对象对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要你已添加到代码和调用中的示例构造函数或窗体上的另一种方法创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还要求映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此版本的方法将添加现有到集合。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 此方法通常用于重用现有的子项，从其他对象。This method is typically used to reuse existing subitems from other objects. 添加到集合的项列表的末尾处插入。Items that are added to the collection are inserted at the end of the list. 若要将项插入集合中特定位置处，使用方法。To insert an item into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 如果你想要添加的现有数组对象，你可以使用的版本接受的数组的方法作为参数的对象。If you want to add an array of existing objects, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法允许您通过指定子项的文本添加到集合的一个子项。This version of the method allows you to add a subitem to the collection by specifying the text of the subitem. 此外，此版本的方法允许你指定的初始前景颜色、 背景色和子项文本的字体。In addition, this version of the method allows you to specify the initial foreground color, background color, and font of the subitem text. 当调用此方法时，新创建具有指定的文本。When this method is called, a new is created with the specified text. 然后，可以使用返回此方法以设置属性并调用方法来操作该子项。You can then use the that is returned by this method to set properties and call methods to manipulate the subitem. 如果你已经有一个现成你想要添加到集合，你可以使用的版本方法接受作为参数或使用方法如果你想要在特定添加子项集合中的位置。If you already have an existing that you want to add to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts a as a parameter, or use the method if you want to add the subitem at a specific position in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，子项使用前景颜色、 背景色和为父项指定的字体。By default, subitems use the foreground color, background color, and font specified for the parent item. 设置属性`false`以防止重写子项样式的父项样式。Set the property to `false` to prevent the parent item styles from overriding the subitem styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此版本的方法将一个字符串数组添加到该集合，其中每个集合中的字符串表示一个新子项的文本。You can use this version of the method to add an array of strings to the collection, where each string in the collection represents the text of a new subitem. 此外，此版本的方法允许你指定的前景颜色、 背景色和为每个子项的字体。In addition, this version of the method allows you to specify the foreground color, background color, and font for each subitem. 你可以使用其他版本的作为参数接受一个字符串数组，如果你不想要指定前景颜色、 背景色和字体设置为每个子项的方法。You can use the other version of the method that accepts an array of strings as a parameter if you do not want to specify foreground color, background color, and font settings for each subitem. 如果你想要重用现有的对象并将它们添加到集合，你可以使用的版本接受的数组的方法作为参数的对象。If you want to reuse existing objects and add them to the collection, you can use the version of the method that accepts an array of objects as a parameter. 如果你想要添加单个，使用方法。If you want to add a single , use the method. 你还可以使用方法如果你想要添加单个位于集合中特定位置。You can also use the method if you want to add a single at a specific position in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，子项使用前景颜色、 背景色和为父项指定的字体。By default, subitems use the foreground color, background color, and font specified for the parent item. 设置属性`false`以防止重写子项样式的父项样式。Set the property to `false` to prevent the parent item styles from overriding the subitem styles.
